alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 12:55PM MST until December 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. West winds gusting as high as 40 MPH. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Falling and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibilities. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
